name: Hanks Noten Bar
description:
So in order to run this game you will need java17 on your pc

Tutorial:

to play, run the game and click the button that sais "play"

you can walk with WASD

on the right you see a bar (by default empty) that shows what you got in your inventory

on the left you see a bar (by default empty) that shows what the customers want

when a customer is waiting, you should match your bar to the customers bar and then click on the desk where the customer is waiting

if it takes you to long to do so, you wil fail

if there are to much waiting, you will also fail

if there is a random bug you will also fail
